column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I was having a nice bicycle ride on a sunny day .
#text=Something seemed off about my bike but it took me quite the while before I realized what had happened .
#text=At some point , one of my bike 's tires went flat .
#text=I got off at a safe stopping point away from the highway and turned my bicycle upside down .
#text=Sure enough , one of my tires was flat , the back tire specifically .
#text=This was why I always carried a small travel bag of tools .
#text=I set down the bag and began to work .
#text=There was a quick release which made it very easy to take off .
#text=Next , I used my tire lever to detach the tire from the rim .
#text=Before putting in a new tube from my bag , I filled it with just a little bit of air .
#text=Once it was set in place , I just put the tire back on and continued my trip .
